code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[scroll,setScroll]=useState(false);const location=useLocation();useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const isAtBottom=window.innerHeight+window.scrollY>=document.documentElement.scrollHeight-100;setScroll(isAtBottom);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:`navbar ${scroll?'scrolled':''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-logo",children:"Siddharth Shekhar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:location.pathname==='/'?'active':'',children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/experience",className:location.pathname==='/experience'?'active':'',children:"Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/education",className:location.pathname==='/education'?'active':'',children:"Education"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/projects",className:location.pathname==='/projects'?'active':'',children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/skills",className:location.pathname==='/skills'?'active':'',children:"Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/games",className:location.pathname==='/games'?'active':'',children:"Games"})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
